successes.title: Codlo®: simple & compact home sous-vide cooking
successes.description: Codlo transforms your rice or slow cooker into a sous-vide machine. Try sous-vide now for easy, healthy gourmet cooking at home.

Pledges.description: Get a digital copy of Codlo's Sous-Vide Guide which contains temperature charts, sous-vide tips and awesome recipes. PLUS our sincere thanks and listing on our List of Awesome at codlo.com/listofawesome!

Get us going! One Firebrick Red Codlo at a very sexy price. PLUS a digital copy of Codlo's Sous-Vide Guide. Limited to 200 units only, don't miss out! Codlo will retail for at least £129 each. Free shipping to the UK (add £15 for international shipping).
We'll contact you on shipping address and plug choice (US, EU, or UK-types) after funding has ended.
